attributes.action: Allow the Leavers to say if they voted to Leave the EU without a deal.
attributes.additional_details:
Krishna guru-Murthy on CH4 news stated on Friday 5 April, there was no proof Leavers want to Leave without a deal.
I totally disagree with him & hope this Petition will prove the point.
attributes.background: Did the 17.4 million Leave voters vote to Leave without a deal?
